participants.name: Tom Serani
participants.title: EVP Business Development at Unitedweb, SiteLock

messages.message: No problem. Look forward to meeting you the next time I am in Scottsdale.
I hope so. Quick question I got recently, maybe your answer is better. How do you keep up with technology?
Feedback from partners and industry peers.
I suspect your answer would be different based off your role.
Oh good. I said news and research.
